title: Integrations settings
text: Here you can configure all the integrations you want to use within Honmarr.
savedSuccessfully: Your changes have been saved successfully, you can now close this window
deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} ?
closeConfirmation: Are you sure you'd like to close this window ?
CloseConfirmationExplanation: If you close this window, your changes will not be saved

integration.urlDescription: Url for the integration, generally an IP
integration.name: Name
integration.AddedDescription: The integration {{name}} has been added successfully
